speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: SCENE IV. Paris. The palace.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Enter KING HENRY VI, GLOUCESTER, BISHOP OF  WINCHESTER, YORK, SUFFOLK, SOMERSET, WARWICK,  EXETER, VERNON BASSET, and others. To them with his Soldiers, TALBOT

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: My gracious prince, and honourable peers,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Hearing of your arrival in this realm,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: I have awhile given truce unto my wars,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: To do my duty to my sovereign:

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: In sign, whereof, this arm, that hath reclaim'd

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: To your obedience fifty fortresses,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Twelve cities and seven walled towns of strength,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Beside five hundred prisoners of esteem,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Lets fall his sword before your highness' feet,

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: And with submissive loyalty of heart

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Ascribes the glory of his conquest got

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: First to my God and next unto your grace.

speaker: TALBOT
text_entry: Kneels

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Is this the Lord Talbot, uncle Gloucester,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: That hath so long been resident in France?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Yes, if it please your majesty, my liege.

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Welcome, brave captain and victorious lord!

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: When I was young, as yet I am not old,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: I do remember how my father said

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: A stouter champion never handled sword.

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Long since we were resolved of your truth,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Your faithful service and your toil in war;

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Yet never have you tasted our reward,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Or been reguerdon'd with so much as thanks,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Because till now we never saw your face:

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Therefore, stand up; and, for these good deserts,

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: We here create you Earl of Shrewsbury;

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: And in our coronation take your place.

speaker: KING HENRY VI
text_entry: Sennet. Flourish. Exeunt all but VERNON and BASSET

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Now, sir, to you, that were so hot at sea,

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Disgracing of these colours that I wear

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: In honour of my noble Lord of York:

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Darest thou maintain the former words thou spakest?

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: Yes, sir; as well as you dare patronage

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: The envious barking of your saucy tongue

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: Against my lord the Duke of Somerset.

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Sirrah, thy lord I honour as he is.

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: Why, what is he? as good a man as York.

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Hark ye; not so: in witness, take ye that.

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Strikes him

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: Villain, thou know'st the law of arms is such

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: That whoso draws a sword, 'tis present death,

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: Or else this blow should broach thy dearest blood.

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: But I'll unto his majesty, and crave

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: I may have liberty to venge this wrong;

speaker: BASSET
text_entry: When thou shalt see I'll meet thee to thy cost.

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Well, miscreant, I'll be there as soon as you;

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: And, after, meet you sooner than you would.

speaker: VERNON
text_entry: Exeunt
